alert.note: Alert for Lenawee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lenawee County through 200 PM EDT... At 116 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tecumseh, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Britton around 120 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Manitou Beach-Devils Lake, Rome Center, Macon, Riga, Springville, Cambridge Junction, Ridgeway, Palmyra, Tipton and Holloway. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
